title: Bug 23066TextEditor performSaveAs doesn't show default path or file name
description: Bug 23066TextEditor performSaveAs doesn't show default path or file name ((IFileEditorInput)input).getFile() : null;if (original != null)dialog.setOriginalFile(original);dialog.create();
OB: Problem is, dialog.setOriginalFile() is called after dialog.create(), which hasalready used null value of originalFile.
EB: The code should be:SaveAsDialog dialog= new SaveAsDialog(shell);IEditorInput input = getEditorInput();IFile original= (input instanceof IFileEditorInput) ?
